plastic bottle.guide: Rinse and place in the recycling bin for plastics.

banana peel.guide: Place in compost or biodegradable waste bin.

used syringe.guide: Dispose in a sharps container at medical facilities.

face mask.guide: Place in a sealed bag and dispose in hazardous waste bins.

office paper.guide: Stack neatly and send to paper recycling facilities.

broken glass.guide: Handle carefully, place in marked glass bin.

cooking oil.guide: Collect in sealed container and send to hazardous disposal centers.

aluminum can.guide: Rinse and drop in the metal recycling bin.

leftover food.guide: Place in compost bin or biodegradable disposal area.

light bulb.guide: Recycle at e-waste or hazardous collection points.

cement debris.guide: Transport to construction waste recycling or landfill.

paint can.guide: Dispose at chemical waste collection centers.

printer cartridge.guide: Return to manufacturer or e-waste facility for recycling.

medical gloves.guide: Place in sealed biohazard bags for proper disposal.

plastic straw.guide: Dispose in general trash; consider reusable alternatives.

tires.guide: Send to tire recycling facility or repurpose.

electronic circuit board.guide: Dispose through certified e-waste recycling facilities.

garden leaves.guide: Compost or dispose in biodegradable bin.

expired medicine.guide: Return to pharmacy take-back program or hazardous waste center.

name: Ink Cartridge
disposal: Return to supplier or recycling center.

name: Fertilizer Bag
disposal: Dispose in agricultural chemical waste collection.
